> The diff coverage is `100%`.

| [pandas/util/testing.py](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/24961/diff?src=pr&el=tree#diff-cGFuZGFzL3V0aWwvdGVzdGluZy5weQ==) | `88.04% <0%> (-0.1%)` | :arrow_down: |
